title: Probability of library expansion support given age

content.description:
The table shows the responses from <math alttext="103" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>103</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> people when asked if they support a proposal to expand the public library.

One person from those who responded will be selected at random.
content.question: Which of the following is closest to the probability that the person selected will be someone who responded no, given that the person selected is age <math alttext="55" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>55</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> or older?

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
